data.message: You will probably never see this...but I think we should hang out. You say you can't be monogamous...I get it...You hate blondes too but mine is natural so I'm never in front of the mirror with some peroxide looking for a T-shirt to wear 😊. Your anger and psychotic lyrics get me going. Or maybe you can bring me to your studio and we can work on a track. However or whenever  we could be like a tornado hitting a volcano  You got my number use it 👑and no I'm not Stan lol

replies.message: Andrew Hotbrimestone Simumba  A girl can dream lol
